arts.ttl: Latest report confirms Mohammed Kudus joined Tottenham over bitter London rival
arts.sum: Mohammed Kudus hates Chelsea, pass it on.

arts.ttl: West Ham vs Tottenham: Premier League Preview, Gameweek 4 2025
arts.sum: Graham Potter will attempt to win back-to-back Premier League games for West Ham for only the second time since last February. Despite the good start Tottenham suffered a 1-0 defeat in their last game before the international break against Bournemouth.

arts.ttl: 'I left West Ham for Tottenham like Mohammed Kudus - he should know exactly what to expect'
arts.sum: Mohammed Kudus will be braced for a hostile reception when he returns to former club West Ham on Saturday, just weeks after leaving the London club for Tottenham Hotspur

arts.ttl: 'I had no choice but to quit West Ham for Tottenham – what the fans did hurt me'
arts.sum: Scott Parker was stung after being booed by West Ham fans during his return to Upton Park with Tottenham, the club he joined after being relegated with the Hammers

arts.ttl: Thomas Frank all but confirms start for Tottenham's new star vs West Ham
arts.sum: Tottenham supporters should catch their two latest signings in action on Saturday evening.

arts.ttl: West Ham vs. Tottenham: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: Mohammed Kudus’ return to London Stadium will gets tongues wagging.

arts.ttl: 4 keys to Tottenham returning to winning ways at West Ham
arts.sum: Tottenham travel to the London Stadium having returned from the September break unscathed.

arts.ttl: “Electric’ game changer can outshine Kudus | West Ham v Tottenham
arts.sum: However much West Ham fans would like to see the side that ended the Forest game named as the starting XI tomorrow, two of the substitutes that were introduced late on with such a dramatic impact on the game are unlikely to start against Spurs. arts.ttl: West Ham v Tottenham : ‘One to watch’ will surprise you | Report
arts.sum: With all of the build up being about Mohammed Kudus and the Tottenham West Ham rivalry, few would have expected a defender to be mentioned in a report this afternoon as being the ‘one to watch’ at West Ham.
